mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMS (user_id, type, title, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, type, title, description, status, file_url, file_type, created_at FROM ITEMS WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS 'count' FROM ITEMS WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = 'OBJECT' GROUP BY status
